title: 关于在服务器内，怎样让时装工坊内的时装死亡不掉落
author: 唐泽俊之
txt_content:
关于在服务器内，怎样让时装工坊内的时装死亡不掉落
如上，求解

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
修改config/armourersWorkshop里的common.cfg里的设置。    # Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never drop
    # 2 = always drop
    I:dropSkinsOnDeath=1复制代码
